text:
GH Recap: Robin reminisces about Olivia, who puts a plan in motion for Sam 
Dustin Cushman Tuesday, February 21st, 2017 
Tuesday February 21, 2017: Olivia stalks Sam, Nelle and Michael wind up stranded at the cabin, Ned makes a confession to Olivia, and Curtis and Jordan argue. Pin 
At the Metro Court, Sonny leaves a message for Carly that he’ll meet her at his place. Jason arrives and meets up with Sonny, who confesses he’s going to tell Carly the truth about Nelle. Meanwhile, Dante meets Ned for lunch and tells him that his mom rejected his proposal. Ned was hoping Dante could explain what he’s missing with Olivia. Dante explains that his mother is very self-reliant and has never had to depend on anyone. Elsewhere, Jordan overhears Curtis ordering two burgers to be sent up to Grace’s room. They bicker about things, and she tells him that Andre dumped her thanks to the kiss they shared. To make matters worse, Jordan tells him that Scott is claiming Curtis planted the evidence against Ava to try and get the case against her thrown out. She warns him she will take him down if she loses her job. He tells her that her real problem is she’s still in denial about wanting him. Curtis leaves her to return to his date. 
Related: Donnell Turner stars in the film The Choir Director 
Up at the cabin, Nelle and Michael are trapped in the blizzard. Things go from bad to worse when they lose power. Michael suggests they make the best of the situation and build a fire, but they end up soaked when they bring in wood from outside. They build a fire and decide to soak in the tub while their clothes dry. They both drape themselves in towels for modesty and take turns soaking in the tub. She thanks him for taking care of her. He tells her that she was there for him when he needed her after Morgan’s death. He offers to be here for her now like she was for him, if she needs someone to lean on. 
Olivia Falconeri meets Julian at the Floating Rib, where he gives her a copy of his will with a healthy inheritance for Leo. Olivia thinks he must be in big trouble, but he claims he just wanted to make sure Leo would be taken care of. He knows she and Ned are doing a good job taking care of his son, which makes her even more suspicious. She demands he level with her, but he refuses and heads out when Ned arrives. Olivia tells Ned about her meeting with Julian, and he apologizes for his proposal. He worries he can’t be the man she deserves, and he’s terrified of marrying her. She asks if he’s taking back his proposal. He tells her it is still on the table, and he’s going to work on becoming the man worthy of her. 
More: Ashley Jones stars in the Lifetime movie 12 Days of Giving 
At GH, Olivia Jerome stalks Sam in the garage, but hides when Sam runs into Robin. Olivia flashes back to when she met Robin as a child. She listens in as Robin wishes Sam luck at her appointment and says she’ll see her around. Sam heads into GH, and Robin goes to her car and narrowly catches Olivia, who hides behind a dumpster. Meanwhile, Sam is shocked to learn Dr. Lee never asked her to come in. She kills time talking with Lucas and warns him to be careful in case he runs into Julian. Sam returns to her car in the garage and finds it is dead. Olivia knocks on her window and offers to help her out. Sam recognizes Olivia as her mom’s sponsor. Olivia offers her a ride. Back in GH, Julian runs into Lucas, and hands him a letter he wrote him about his past and Lucas’ mother. He wanted him to have it just in case, which prompts Lucas to question why he’s giving this to him now. Jason interrupts them, and Lucas takes the envelope and leaves. Julian lashes out at Jason for meddling in his affairs when he warned him not to. Julian tells Jason if anything happens to Sam or Danny, they are both to blame now. 
Robin meets up with Sonny and Jason at the Metro Court and they all share hugs. Jason must run and meet Sam. Sonny and Robin catch up, and she tells him she is here because Anna is sick. She fills him in on Anna’s condition, and they discuss Ava being charged with Morgan’s murder. Robin remembers how horrible Olivia Jerome was, and flashes back to when she first met her. 
Olivia Jerome drives Sam home and makes small talk. Olivia tells her about how she came from a big tight knit family, so everyone thought, but they were always at one another’s throats. Olivia confesses she’s spent a lot of time working on reinventing herself, which prompts Sam to remember the Chinese characters for reincarnation. She notices Olivia has the same characters on an amulet hanging from her rearview mirror. 
Bobbie tells Carly there won’t be a romantic getaway this weekend. 
Nelle tells Michael that she’ll do anything necessary to get something. 
Tracy asks Hayden if they will be able to keep the hospital open. 
Julian visits Ava in jail. 
Jason tells Sonny there is a good chance she killed Morgan. 
Sam asks Olivia to pull over.
